name: Quantization Fingerprint
description: Analyzes JPEG quantization table fingerprints. Camera images show characteristic quantization patterns while AI images lack standard compression signatures.
mechanism: Analyzes pixel value histograms for periodic patterns caused by JPEG quantization. Camera images show comb-like patterns.
parameters: Periods: 2-8, Metrics: comb ratio, periodic score
useCase: Identifying JPEG compression signatures from camera pipelines
